Package org.mundo.net

Provides classes for communication with remote peers.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ISerialize The basic interface for serializer/deserializer-bundles.
 

Class Summary
AbstractHandler This is a helper class for implementing custom protocol handlers.
AckHandler Provides a TCP-like flow/congestion control handler.
ActivationService A protocol handler for object activation and passivation.
BinCollectHandler A protocol handler to collect all chunks of a message into a single chunk.
BinDeserializer BinDeserializer transforms a byte stream into a passive object tree.
BinFragHandler An experimental fragmentation handler.
BinSerializationHandler A protocol handler to serialize/deserialize the MundoCore binary protocol.
BinSerializer Transforms a passive object tree into a byte stream.
BinSerializerBundle Deprecated.  
DelayHandler Delays sending of all packets.
DropHandler This handler randomly drops packets.
HLFragHandler An experimental fragmentation handler.
NAckHandler An experimental selective negative acknowledgment handler.
ProtocolCoordinator This service forwards local messages to the first routing service in the protocol stack.
ProtocolCoordinator.Options Options to configure node discovery.
ProtocolStackBuilder  
RMCService A management service to enable Remote Method Calls.
TraceHandler This handler writes a trace file to monitor traffic.
 

Package org.mundo.net Description

Provides classes for communication with remote peers.
